Name: Panzer Girls
About the game: Play shooting games from the perspective of chariot and command view. You will play a commander guarding the peace chariot, leading a row of charming but deadly crew to skillfully defeat the enemy, guard the town and resist alien invasion. In order to deal with more and more difficult enemies, you need to buy cards, strengthen characters and upgrade chariots. A commander with rich personality Free skill combination and changeable tactics Rich natural environment Challenge score ranking
